pageContext.claim: “What I have done is approximately a 104-page summary -- and, really, in great detail -- of assets and values. And nobody wants to go over that because it's so good. … But I have no obligation to do that [release tax returns] while I'm under audit. And no lawyer would tell you to release your tax returns while you're under audit.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's personal financial disclosure to the Federal Election Commission is detailed, but his tax returns would give a definitive and full account of how much he paid in taxes and the sources of his income.
